definition: (old) third person singular pronoun ("he" or "she")/second person singular pronoun ("you")/(May 4th period) third person singular feminine pronoun ("she")/(Classical Chinese) introductory particle with no specific meaning/that (preceding a noun)
surname Yi/abbr. for 伊拉克[Yi1 la1 ke4], Iraq/abbr. for 伊朗[Yi1 lang3], Iran
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: You'll report to me here. Butthe Consulate Security Man must not know that I am in Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 但是領事館的治安官不能知道我在伊斯坦布爾。

sentences.english: I could always catch the bus up later in Istanbul or Sofia.
sentences.chinese: 我可以搭乘後面的巴士到伊斯坦布爾或索菲亞。

sentences.english: I came to Istanbul because I am interested in the history of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我來到伊斯坦布爾因爲我對這個城市的歷史感興趣。

sentences.english: Welcome to Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到伊斯坦布爾博斯普魯斯海峽四季酒店。

sentences.english: Istambul is now peopled by 4 million Turks.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯坦布爾現在有四百萬土耳其人。

sentences.english: Embark on a majestic crossing of the Bosphorus to discover breathtaking Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其伊斯坦布爾的旅行記憶。

sentences.english: Then we take the Orient Express to Istanbul from there.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們從那裏乘東方快車去伊斯坦布爾。

sentences.english: They plan on seeing each other again, whether in Paris or Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 他們計劃在巴黎或伊斯坦布爾再會。

sentences.english: From Iran's side, the message going into the Istanbul talks is clear.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗方面帶到伊斯坦布爾會談的信息是非常明確的。

sentences.english: Then we take the Orient Express to Istanbul from Nice.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們從尼斯乘東方快車去伊斯坦布爾。

sentences.english: Butthe Consulate Security Man must not know that I am in Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 但是領事館的治安官不能知道我在伊斯坦布爾。

sentences.english: Today, Istanbul is one of many destinations on varied elegant itineraries throughout Europe.
sentences.chinese: 如今，伊斯坦布爾是衆多歐洲雅緻旅行路線的終點地。

sentences.english: Karakoy had always been the heart of the commerce in Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉柯伊一直是伊斯坦布爾商業中心。

sentences.english: The Topkapi Palace lies on the European side of Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 託普卡普宮殿位於歐洲伊斯坦布爾一側。

sentences.english: Mr. Shahristani plans to hold a news conference in Istanbul after the event.
sentences.chinese: 沙赫雷斯塔尼計劃事後在伊斯坦布爾召開新聞發佈會。

sentences.english: Welcome to Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at Sultanahmet.
sentences.chinese: 來到伊斯坦布爾清真寺四季酒店。

definition: Yekaterinburg (Russian city, also known as Ekaterinburg or Sverdlovsk)
